name: VR-Xterminator

minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 64-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: VR required
